anya-e0105n26:1_1: Visuddhimaggo viya sīlasamādhipaññānaṁ visuṁ visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpako eko paṭipattigantho.
anya-e0105n26:2_0: ‘‘Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā;
anya-e0105n26:3_0: Anubuddhā ime dhammā, gotamena yasassinā’’ti dī. ni. 2.186; a. ni. 4.1 –
anya-e0105n26:4_0: Imaṁ gāthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dassetvā tadatthavaṇṇanāvasena sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo visuṁ visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpitā.
anya-e0105n26:4_1: So pana gantho idāni cinaraṭṭheyeva diṭṭho, cinabhāsāya ca parivattito (1048-bu-va) saṅghapālena nāma bhikkhunā.
anya-e0105n26:4_2: Kena pana so kuto ca tattha ānītoti na pākaṭametaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:4_3: Tassa pana saṅghapālassa ācariyo guṇabhadro nāma mahāyāniko bhikkhu majjhimaindiyadesiko, so indiyaraṭṭhato cinaraṭṭhaṁ gacchanto paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā tato (978-bu-va) cinaraṭṭhaṁ gato.
anya-e0105n26:4_4: Tadā so tena ānīto bhaveyya vimuttimagga, visuddhimagga.
anya-e0105n26:5_0: Tasmiñhi vimuttimagge pubbāciṇṇanidānadassanaṁ dhātunidānadassanañca yatheva visuddhimagge ekaccevādo, tathevāgataṁ.
anya-e0105n26:5_1: Dosanidānadassane pana ‘‘semhādhiko rāgacarito, pittādhiko dosacarito, vātādhiko mohacarito.
anya-e0105n26:5_2: Semhādhiko vā mohacarito, vātādhiko rāgacarito’’ti tiṇṇampi rāgadosamohānaṁ dosaniyamo vutto.
anya-e0105n26:5_3: Ācariyabuddhaghosena diṭṭhavimuttimaggapotthake pana ‘‘pittādhiko dosacarito’’ti pāṭho ūno bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:6_0: Aññānipi bahūni visuddhimagge paṭikkhittāni tattha vimuttimagge gahetabbabhāvena dissanti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n26:7_0: Sīlaniddese (1, 8-piṭṭhe) ‘‘aññe pana siraṭṭho sīlattho, sītalattho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṁ vaṇṇayantī’’ti paṭikkhitto atthopi tattha gahetabbabhāvena dissati.
anya-e0105n26:8_0: Tathā dhutaṅganiddese (1, 78-piṭṭhe) ‘‘yesampi kusalattikavinimuttaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ, tesaṁ atthato dhutaṅgameva natthi, asantaṁ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṁ nāma bhavissati, dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṁ āpajjati, tasmā taṁ na gahetabba’’nti paṭikkhittaṁ paññattidhutaṅgampi tattha dissati.
anya-e0105n26:8_1: Mahāṭīkāyaṁ (1-104) pana ‘‘yesanti abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha, te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadantī’’ti vaṇṇitaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:9_0: Tathā pathavīkasiṇaniddese (1, 144) ‘‘paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro, upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā, sampahaṁsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayantī’’tiādinā paṭikkhittaekevādopi tattha dissati.
anya-e0105n26:10_0: Tathā khandhaniddese (2, 80-piṭṭhe) ‘‘balarūpaṁ sambhavarūpaṁ jātirūpaṁ rogarūpaṁ ekaccānaṁ matena middharūpa’’nti evaṁ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ tesaṁ paṭikkhittabhāvo pakāsito.
anya-e0105n26:10_3: Na kevalaṁ dassanamattameva, atha kho middharūpassa atthibhāvopi ‘‘middhaṁ nāma tividhaṁ āhārajaṁ utujaṁ cittajañcāti.
anya-e0105n26:10_4: Tesu cittajameva nīvaraṇaṁ hoti, sesā pana dve arahatopi bhaveyyu’’ntiādinā sādhito.
anya-e0105n26:11_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimagge visuddhimaggena asamānatthānaṁ vuttabhāvo ca abhayagirivāsīhi tassa ganthassa paṭiggahitabhāvo ca sakkā ñātuṁ.
anya-e0105n26:11_1: Aññānipi pana īdisāni asamānavacanāni bahūni tattha saṁvijjantiyeva, tāni pana sabbāni na sakkā idha dassetuṁ.
anya-e0105n26:12_0: Yebhuyyena panassa karaṇappakāro visuddhimaggassa viya hoti.
anya-e0105n26:12_1: Yā yā hi pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato vā paṭisambhidāmaggato vā aññasuttantehi vā ānetvā sādhakabhāvena visuddhimagge dassiyati, tatthapi sā sā pāḷi yebhuyyena dissateva.
anya-e0105n26:13_0: Yā visuddhimagge (1, 47-piṭṭhe) ‘‘pañca sīlāni pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ sīla’’ntiādikā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi dassitā, sā vimuttimaggepi dissateva.
anya-e0105n26:14_1: vicāro vicikicchāyā’’ti vacanaṁ peṭake vuttanti dassitaṁ, tañca tatthapi tatheva dassetvā ‘‘tipeṭake vutta’’nti niddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:14_2: Tipeṭaketi nāmañca peṭakopadesameva sandhāya vuttaṁ bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:14_3: Tattha hi vivicceva kāmehīti pāṭhasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘alobhassa pāripūriyā kāmehi viveko sampajjati, adosassa.
anya-e0105n26:14_4: Amohassa pāripūriyā akusalehi dhammehi viveko sampajjatī’’ti pāṭhassa tipeṭake vuttabhāvo dassito.
anya-e0105n26:14_5: So ca pāṭho peṭakopadese (262-piṭṭhe) ‘‘tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehī’’tiādinā dissati.
anya-e0105n26:15_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (1, 258-piṭṭhe) ‘‘ayampi kho bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito’’tiādikā pāḷi mahāvaggasaṁyuttakato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:16_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (1, 272-piṭṭhe) ‘‘assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato’’tiādi pāḷi ca (1, 273-piṭṭhe) kakacūpamapāḷi ca paṭisambhidāmaggato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:17_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 69-piṭṭhe) ‘‘katamā cintāmayā paññā’’tiādikā ca pāḷi ‘‘tattha katamaṁ āyakosalla’’ntiādikā ca pāḷi (2, 71-piṭṭhe) ‘‘dukkhe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’tiādikā ca pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:17_1: Sabbāpi ca tattha vuttā ekavidhaduvidhādipaññāpabhedakathā visuddhimagge vuttakathāya yebhuyyena samānāyeva.
anya-e0105n26:19_0: Parittaṁ sukhumaṁ etaṁ, ūkāsirasamūpama’’nti visuddhi. 2.436; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 596 –
anya-e0105n26:20_0: Ayampi gāthā vimuttimaggepi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitabhāveneva dassitā.
anya-e0105n26:20_1: Ūkāsirasamūpamanti padaṁ pana ūkāsamūpamanti tattha dissati, tañca paramparalekhakānaṁ pamādalekhamattameva siyā.
anya-e0105n26:21_0: Catūsu saccesu visuddhimagge viya vacanatthato lakkhaṇato anūnādhikato kamato antogadhānaṁ pabhedato upamāto ca vinicchayo dassito, so ca yebhuyyena visuddhimaggena visuddhi.
anya-e0105n26:22_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 242-245) sammasanañāṇakathāyaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ atītādiekādasavidhena ca aniccādilakkhaṇattayena ca visuṁ visuṁ sammasananayo dassito, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:22_1: Cakkhādijarāmaraṇapariyosānesu pana dhammesu dhammavicārapariyosānānaṁ saṭṭhiyā eva dhammānaṁ aniccādilakkhaṇattayena sammasananayo tattha dassito.
anya-e0105n26:23_1: ubho bhijjanti paccayā’’ti gāthā ca, ‘‘na cakkhuto jāyare’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca, ‘‘na sakena balena jāyare’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca vimuttimagge bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṁ dassitā.
anya-e0105n26:24_0: Visuddhimagge (2, 261-2-piṭṭhesu) arūpasattakesu ariyavaṁsakathānayena vutto kalāpato ca yamakato ca sammasananayo vimuttimagge ettheva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṁ dassito.
anya-e0105n26:25_0: Vimuttimagge buddhānussatikathāyaṁ lokavidūti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ sattalokasaṅkhāralokavasena dveyeva lokā dassitā, na pana okāsaloko yathā visuddhimagge (1, 199-200-piṭṭhesu).
anya-e0105n26:26_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimaggo nāma gantho kīdisoti sakkā anuminituṁ.
anya-e0105n26:26_1: So pana yathā na mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ gantho hoti, evaṁ mahāyānikānampi na hotiyeva theravādapiṭakameva nissāya katabhāvato.
anya-e0105n26:26_2: Yasmā pana tattha na kiñcipi sīhaḷadīpikaṁ nāmaṁ vā theravādo vā dissati, tasmā so sīhaḷadīpe kataganthopi na hoti.
anya-e0105n26:26_3: Indiyaraṭṭhikaṁ pana nāmañca vohāro ca tattha bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, tasmā indiyaraṭṭhe kataganthova bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:26_4: Yasmā cassa peṭakopadesaṁ nissitabhāvo bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, visesato pana middharūpassa atthibhāvo ca, arahatopi tassa atthibhāvo ca tameva nissāya dassīyati, paṭisambhidāmaggagaṇṭhipade ca peṭaketi padassa paṭi. ma. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n26:26_5: 1.1.36 atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘suttantapiṭakatthāya aṭṭhakathā peṭakaṁ mahisāsakānaṁ gantho’’ti vaṇṇito.
anya-e0105n26:26_6: Tasmā eso vimuttimaggo mahisāsakanikāyikena kato bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ mati.
